subject: World Cup (Skiing)
Alpine Skiing
lead_paragraph: Battling gusting, swirling winds, Stacey Cook and Kevin Francis claimed the super-G titles at the United States Alpine Championships at Sugarloaf in Carrabassett Valley, Me.Cook collected her second national title when she edged her teammate Leanne Smith by five-hundredths of a second. Cook also won the super-G crown on the same hill in 2006. Lindsey Vonn, the World Cup overall champion, finished fourth.Francis beat out Bryon Friedman for his first national title.
